scripts.setup: yarn && yarn setup:env auto && yarn setup:db && yarn setup:packages
scripts.setup:packages: yarn workspaces foreach --verbose --topological --exclude ROOT --exclude docker-helpers run setup
scripts.pretest: yarn workspaces foreach --verbose --topological --exclude ROOT --exclude docker-helpers run pretest
scripts.posttest: yarn workspaces foreach --verbose --topological --exclude ROOT --exclude docker-helpers run posttest
scripts.depcheck: yarn workspaces foreach --verbose --topological --exclude ROOT --exclude docker-helpers exec depcheck --ignores="@app/config,@app/client,tslib,webpack,babel-plugin-import,source-map-support,@graphql-codegen/*,*eslint*,@typescript-eslint/*,graphql-toolkit,net,tls,dayjs,@types/jest,babel-jest,jest,mock-req,mock-res,nodemon,ts-jest,ts-loader,ts-node,update-dotenv,mkdirp,@types/helmet,helmet" --ignore-dirs=".next"
scripts.dev: yarn && yarn workspaces foreach --verbose --topological --exclude ROOT --exclude docker-helpers run codegen && tsc -b && concurrently --kill-others --names "TSC,WATCH,RUN,TEST" --prefix "({name})" --prefix-colors "yellow.bold,yellow.bold,cyan.bold,greenBright.bold" "tsc -b --watch --preserveWatchOutput" "yarn workspaces foreach --verbose --parallel --interlaced --exclude ROOT --exclude docker-helpers run watch" "yarn workspaces foreach --verbose --parallel --interlaced --exclude ROOT --exclude docker-helpers run dev" "yarn test:watch --delay 10"
scripts.build: yarn workspaces foreach --verbose --topological --exclude ROOT --exclude docker-helpers run build
